```{r, echo=F,warning=FALSE,message=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(ggplot2)
library(knitr)
library(kableExtra)
d <- read_csv("~/Google Drive/KBO/predictions.csv")
d <- d %>% arrange(Rank)
d$Team <- paste0("[", d$Team, "](/teams/", gsub(" ", "", d$Team), ")") 
kable(d, digits = c(0,0,0,1,2,0,0,0,0,0,0), col.names = c("Rank","Team","Elo", "wRC+", "FIP", "1st","2nd","3rd","4th","5th","Out")) %>%
  add_header_above(c("2020 Season To-Date" = 5, "Playoff Seed Likelihood" = 6)) %>% kable_styling(bootstrap_options = c("striped", "hover"), fixed_thead = T) %>% column_spec(2, bold = T) %>% column_spec(5, border_right = T)
```
Projections based on 100,000 Monte Carlo simulations. See the [FAQ](https://www.kbofancystats.com/faq/eloratings/) for more details on Elo ratings.
